fullText:
You don’t need a giant LLM on your iPhone to solve an IMO problem — you just need a small one to execute the actions you ask for.

We built an internal app with our xLAM-3B model running locally on iPhone. Demo video Demo video (audio on 🔊) 👇 https://t.co/xS0tx2Dylm

Apple is behaving in a manner that makes it impossible for any AI company besides OpenAI to reach #1 in the App Store, which is an unequivocal antitrust violation. 

xAI will take immediate legal action.
“Humanity’s Last Exam” is probably not going to be the last AI benchmark…
